CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Hafnia Ltd is a shipping company. It provides transportation of oil and oil products and also owns and operates oil product tankers. It offers fleet and bunkers services. The group operates through four segments namely LR2 Product Tankers, LR1 Product Tankers, MR and Chemical-MR segment, and Handy and Chemical-Handy segment. It generates maximum revenue from the LR1 Product Tankers segment.
